author: Zach
description: Smaller than expected

author: Amazon Customer
description: Tastes great!

author: Deirdre Martin
description: I use it in my coffee. It does leave an aftertaste that is typical of these types of sweeteners.

author: Joseph Rogers
description: Perfect Keto Collegen added to a smoothy with greens, coconut milk and frozen fruit has a great taste, gives me energy and keeps me feeling full throughout the day. I make one smoothy in the morning and and have tremendous amount of energy and focus. Love the product !

author: Sam
description: Delicious... been drinking it for about a week with my morning coffee. Can’t wait to see its effects of my skin, hair and nails!

author: R. Callicotte
description: Seems to be as good or better than I expected. Easy to digest and helps my joints during exercising.

author: Kat
description: Perfect for adding to my morning Keto Coffee! Tastes delicious and without aftertaste! Will consider reordering on a monthly basis! Thank you!

author: Diana Long
description: Love the taste ! My nails are so much stronger and my hair is shinier and feels thicker.

author: Amazon Customer
description:
It is just... okay. Flavor is acceptable and the nutritional value is what I want, but the consistency is not. Consistency was actually pretty gross, so gross I won't ever use it as a protein shake again (note, maybe you need an actual blender and not a blender bottle? I only used a blender bottle).
TIP: Saw another user suggest mixing it with some whipping cream to create a mousse-like dessert. I tried this and enjoyed it, tasted like dark chocolate mousse. :)
PS... mine also had those weird burn marks on the lid that someone else posted (but the foil seal was not broken).

author: Mydoray
description: This is my morning go to first thing, I add this to my coffee every morning. It dissolves better than other brands I have tried. I use the vanilla and I’m going to try the chocolate next. I am re-ordering on subscribe and save so I don’t run out. I’d really like this packaged in a 30 serving container or offered in a twin pack.

author: Kaandii Apple
description: Yeah

author: Kaandii Apple
description: Yeah

author: Kaandii Apple
description: Yeah

author: Kaandii Apple
description: Yeah

author: Kaandii Apple
description: Yeah

author: A. Felson
description:
I don't know why some people are complaining about it's water consumption versus the size of the reservoir. In my morning routine, I fill the water, check the bean supply, empty the wastebin and clean the bottom plate. Then it's ready for the 8 shots I might have over the course of a day.
It keeps itself nice and clean and is smart enough not to rerun the cleaning cycle if it hasn't been off long enough to cool all the way down.

author: Junk medic
description: DO NOT buy this. Can’t free won’t feed through grinder randomly. Descaling takes an hour and it takes 30 minutes to make a cup of coffee for three people provided the coffee is actually feeding. Pissed I spent this much money.

author: suzanne
description: worked great for two months.... won't grind

author: Yongzinshin
description: excellent

author: I enjoy things
description: So far we have been using this daily for at least 6 shots of espresso and some steaming milk. Has been perfect. The manual is WRONG for descaling. It's been changed for over a year and the manual has still not been updated. That's some really sad stuff. I wasted hours following the procedure which of course never works.

author: Nick C.
description:
First, it maked good espresso.
Then, it died.
I had this machine for a little over a year, before it died. Yes, I dutifully used descaling solution.

author: Paul S. Howell
description: Awesome coffee center. Excellent quality. Great value.

author: Carmen Mercado
description: I use it every day, I do not use the micro to warm the milk

author: NCKofkin
description: Using these instead of plastic straws, just a small way to make a big impact! If everyone did this, it would make a huge difference. You really can't taste the metal. Definitely get them!

author: Steve
description: Great item. Great price.

author: andress411
description: My daughters want to save the planet from the scourge that is the plastic straw. Now they can, and I was a part of that victory.

author: Joy Najolia
description: Love that I'm helping to save the planet while enjoying my beverage with my own, sanitary straw

author: Kendra Machen
title: Comes with way too many side offers like drink cocktail recipes
description: Nope. Bought this subscription based on the title. "Men's Health" for my three teenage sons. Comes with way too many side offers like drink cocktail recipes, sex tips and so on... I was hoping more working out/sports, nutrition etc. My lesson may be your gain.

author: NJ EMTP
description: Great Product, Good Price!

author: William Barna
description: They didn’t taste good at all I would like a new box
